remarks: The complex numbers are an Abelian group under addition.  This version of ~ cnaddabl shows the explicit structure "scaffold" we chose for the definition for Abelian groups.  Note:  This theorem has hard-coded structure indices for demonstration purposes.  It is not intended for general use; use ~ cnaddabl instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)
statement:
cnaddablx.g $e |- G = { <. 1 , CC >. , <. 2 , + >. } $.
cnaddablx $p |- G e. Abel $.
